summary: A notorious international crime group chases after a young chivalrous man, his mentor's daughter, and a famous archaeologist, who possess a map leading to ancient treasure.
cast: Jay Chou|Eric Tsang|Xiaotong Guan|Kenneth Tsang|Chu-he Chen|Chi-Ling Lin|Daoming Chen|Yat-Fei Wong|Will Liu|Alex Shu-Yuan Ko|Pu Miao|Bo Peng|Ian Powers|Teddy Lin|Hongchang Zeng
title: Ci ling
